alert.note: Alert for Coconino (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 15 at 8:24PM MST until August 15 at 11:30PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: The National Weather Service in Flagstaff has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Coconino County in north central Arizona... * Until 1130 PM MST /1230 AM MDT/. * At 821 PM MST /921 PM MDT/, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain over southern Lake Powell, in and near the Labyrinth Canyon watershed. Between 0.25 and 0.75 inches of rain have fallen, with more expected over the next 30 minutes. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of slot canyons, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Labyrinth Canyon, Tower Butte, Glen Canyon National Recreation Area, Lake Powell and Navajo Reservation. This includes the following slot canyons... Labyrinth Canyon. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Be prepared for flash flooding along and near Labyrinth Canyon and Face Canyon over southern Lake Powell.
